name: generate response
decode msg
listen on port you set in wifi stick
info:
If you can't set server B in wifi stick option
or it does not work (like in my case) go to  
`http://(wifi stick local IP)/config_hide.html`
and change default server (server A) to node-red IP

name: make response message for wifi stick
info:
You can use tcp request node to send data to original server:  
`47.88.8.200:10000`
`data1.solarmanpv.com`  
or  
`115.29.186.234:10000`
`data2.solarmanpv.com`  
or just use generate response node to use data only locally
